headline.main: DraftKings, FanDuel Halt Contests on College Sports in All States: ESPN
headline.print_headline: DraftKings, FanDuel Halt Contests on College Sports in All States: ESPN

docs.snippet: Top daily fantasy sports companies DraftKings and FanDuel, in a deal with the NCAA, have agreed to indefinitely suspend contests on college sports in all U.S. states, ESPN reported on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Top daily fantasy sports companies DraftKings and FanDuel, in a deal with the NCAA, have agreed to indefinitely suspend contests on college sports in all U.S. states, ESPN reported on Thursday.

headline.main: A Not-So-Bad Quarter for Funds Brings Sighs of Relief
headline.print_headline: A Not-So-Bad Quarter for Funds Brings Sighs of Relief

docs.snippet: Investors made very little, if anything, from most mutual funds last quarter. Phew....
docs.lead_paragraph: Investors made very little, if anything, from most mutual funds last quarter. Phew.

headline.main: African Refugee Aces NCAA Bracket Picks but Forgets Winner
headline.print_headline: African Refugee Aces NCAA Bracket Picks but Forgets Winner

docs.snippet: James Kiki isn't sure if he'll fill out an NCAA Tournament bracket next year. He might want to....
docs.lead_paragraph: James Kiki isn't sure if he'll fill out an NCAA Tournament bracket next year. He might want to.

headline.main: Argentina Hikes Bus, Train Ticket Prices Amid Job Cut Protests
headline.print_headline: Argentina Hikes Bus, Train Ticket Prices Amid Job Cut Protests

docs.snippet: Commuters in Argentina's capital will see a 100 percent increase for train and bus tickets starting next month under a plan announced on Thursday as part of the new president's fiscal austerity push....
docs.lead_paragraph: Commuters in Argentina's capital will see a 100 percent increase for train and bus tickets starting next month under a plan announced on Thursday as part of the new president's fiscal austerity push.

headline.main: A Love of Drawing and Telling Stories: One Ceramist’s Perfect Formula

docs.snippet: Katharine Morling, whose works are on view at Bergdorf Goodman beginning Thursday, let T into her London studio....

headline.main: Gray Whale Puts on Show at Southern California Beach
headline.print_headline: Gray Whale Puts on Show at Southern California Beach

docs.snippet: A Pacific gray whale put on a show at Southern California's Redondo Beach, popping its huge head out of the waves and rolling around in the surf....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Pacific gray whale put on a show at Southern California's Redondo Beach, popping its huge head out of the waves and rolling around in the surf.

headline.main: German Train Operator: Women-Only Compartments Not Reaction to New Year Attacks
headline.print_headline: German Train Operator: Women-Only Compartments Not Reaction to New Year Attacks

docs.snippet: A German railway company which has introduced women-only compartments on one line said on Thursday the move was not a reaction to the New Year sex attacks in Cologne and other cities but a response to customer requests made earlier in December....
docs.lead_paragraph: A German railway company which has introduced women-only compartments on one line said on Thursday the move was not a reaction to the New Year sex attacks in Cologne and other cities but a response to customer requests made earlier in December.

headline.main: Brazil Security Official Steps Down Ahead of Rio Olympics
headline.print_headline: Brazil Security Official Steps Down Ahead of Rio Olympics

docs.snippet: The commander of a Brazilian security force involved in preparations for the upcoming Olympics in Rio de Janeiro has stepped down amid reports that he criticized embattled President Dilma Rousseff in a message to subordinates....
docs.lead_paragraph: The commander of a Brazilian security force involved in preparations for the upcoming Olympics in Rio de Janeiro has stepped down amid reports that he criticized embattled President Dilma Rousseff in a message to subordinates.

headline.main: Child Beggar to Hero: Videogame Shows Suffering of Senegal Street Children
headline.print_headline: Child Beggar to Hero: Videogame Shows Suffering of Senegal Street Children

docs.snippet: Barefoot, a bucket under one arm, Senegalese child beggar Mamadou dodges cars, taxis and buses on the chaotic streets of Dakar as he searches for his parents in the hope of going home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barefoot, a bucket under one arm, Senegalese child beggar Mamadou dodges cars, taxis and buses on the chaotic streets of Dakar as he searches for his parents in the hope of going home.

headline.main: Turkish President Threatens to Sue Those Who Insult Him
headline.print_headline: Turkish President Threatens to Sue Those Who Insult Him

docs.snippet: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan warned on Thursday that he will continue to sue critics who insult him in Turkey, where journalists and other critics of the president have been imprisoned....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan warned on Thursday that he will continue to sue critics who insult him in Turkey, where journalists and other critics of the president have been imprisoned.
